fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater.sil

Class HeaterElectricitySILModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.AtomicModel
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.equipments.heater.sil.HeaterElectricitySILModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HeaterOperationI, SIL_HeaterOperationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableDefinitionsAndSharingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableInitialisationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.AtomicModelI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.EventsExchangingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI, java.io.Serializable

    @ModelExternalEvents(imported={SwitchOnHeater.class,SwitchOffHeater.class,SIL_SetPowerHeater.class,Heat.class,DoNotHeat.class})
 @ModelExportedVariable(name="currentIntensity",
                       type=java.lang.Double.class)
public class HeaterElectricitySILModel
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
implements SIL_HeaterOperationI
    The class HeaterElectricitySILModel defines a simulation model for the electricity consumption of the heater.

    Description

    The electric power consumption (in amperes) depends upon the state and the current power level i.e., State.OFF => consumption == 0.0, State.ON => consumption == NOT_HEATING_POWER and State.HEATING => consumption >= NOT_HEATING_POWER && consumption <= MAX_HEATING_POWER). The state of the heater is modified by the reception of external events (SwitchOnHeater, SwitchOffHeater, Heat and DoNotHeat). The power level is set through the external event SetPowerHeater that has a parameter defining the required power level. The electric power consumption is stored in the exported variable currentIntensity.

    Initially, the mode is in state State.OFF and the electric power consumption at 0.0.

    • Imported events: SwitchOnHeater, SwitchOffHeater, SetPowerHeater, Heat, DoNotHeat
    • Exported events: none
    • Imported variables: none
    • Exported variables: name = currentIntensity, type = Double

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       NOT_HEATING_POWER >= 0.0
 invariant       MAX_HEATING_POWER > NOT_HEATING_POWER
 invariant       TENSION > 0.0
 invariant       currentState != null
 invariant       totalConsumption >= 0.0
 invariant       currentHeatingPower >= 0.0
 invariant       !currentIntensity.isInitialised() || currentIntensity.getValue() >= 0.0

    Invariants

     invariant       URI != null && !URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       NOT_HEATING_POWER_RUNPNAME != null && !NOT_HEATING_POWER_RUNPNAME.isEmpty()
 invariant       MAX_HEATING_POWER_RUNPNAME != null && !MAX_HEATING_POWER_RUNPNAME.isEmpty()
 invariant       TENSION_RUNPNAME != null && !TENSION_RUNPNAME.isEmpty()

    Created on : 2023-09-29

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean consumptionHasChanged
      true when the electricity consumption of the heater has changed after executing an external event; the external event changes the value of currentState and then an internal transition will be triggered by putting through in this variable which will update the variable currentIntensity.
      protected double currentHeatingPower
      the current heating power between 0 and HeaterElectricityModel.MAX_HEATING_POWER in the power unit used by the heater.
      protected fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.Value<java.lang.Double> currentIntensity
      current intensity in the power unit used by the electric meter.
      protected Heater.HeaterState currentState
      current state of the heater.
      static boolean DEBUG
      when true, leaves a debugging trace of the execution of the model.
      private static long serialVersionUID 
      protected double totalConsumption
      total consumption of the heater during the simulation in kwh.
      static java.lang.String URI
      URI for a model; works when only one instance is created.

      when true, leaves a trace of the execution of the model.
